  "audio": {
    "music": "A soft, reassuring piano melody plays gently underneath the dialogue.",
    "ambient": "The low hum of spacecraft machinery, interspersed with subtle electronic sounds.",

Rock's eyes move thoughtfully, each dart revealing his mental calculus as he tries to remain optimistic. The scene holds a moment of silence, before John's witty reply, deepening their camaraderie in the vast emptiness of space.\"}"}]

GeneralDescription: "Medium Shot - The scene shifts to a small boat gently rocking on the swamp's edge. Naga Anaconda Bakugou, now aboard with the documentary crew, wraps his long anaconda tail comfortingly around several crew members. Some laugh nervously, others relax, surprised by the warmth and softness. Bakugou pulls them closer with a playful grin, giving a reassuring squeeze. The crew, nestled in the coils, share a moment of unexpected comfort, surrounded by the sounds of the jungle. The boat drifts peacefully as dusk falls."
            LocationDescription: |
            Medium Shot - The scene shifts to a small boat gently rocking on the swamp's edge. Naga Anaconda Bakugou, now aboard with the documentary crew, wraps his long anaconda tail comfortingly around several crew members. Some laugh nervously, others relax, surprised by the warmth and softness. Bakugou pulls them closer with a playful grin, giving a reassuring squeeze. The crew, nestled in the coils, share a moment of unexpected comfort, surrounded by the sounds of the jungle. The boat drifts peacefully as dusk falls.

prompt:
GeneralDescription: "Underwater Shot - In the murky depths, Naga Anaconda Bakugou's massive tail coils swiftly around a large capybara swimming near the surface. The capybara struggles, but Bakugou drags it down beneath the water, bubbles rising as he tightens his grip. With predatory precision, Bakugou swallows the capybara whole, the outline of the animal sliding down into the thick, muscular length of his tail—The Naga's Tail, also known as The Stomach. The movement disturbs the silt as the jungle's food chain plays out in silence."

[{"name":"INIT_IMAGE_URL","value":"https://content.dashtoon.ai/stability-images/0f8019fc-6d16-411e-b0b6-fb68d2d36e06.webp"},{"name":"THUMBNAIL_URL","value":"https://content.dashtoon.ai/stability-images/0f8019fc-6d16-411e-b0b6-fb68d2d36e06.webp"},{"name":"ORIGINAL_VIDEO_URL","value":"https://content.dashtoon.ai/saved-videos/b9882b34-6551-4969-9623-b0ba71f266c6.mp4"},{"name":"ENHANCED_PROMPT","value":"{
  "shot": {
    "composition": "Medium shots frame four separate bedrooms, each focusing on a character lying awake in dim light.",
    "subjects": "ALEX, JORDAN, SAM, RILEY in their individual rooms, each lost in thought.",
    "camera_motion": "Camera gently shifts between each character, blending their individual spaces into one continuous emotional narrative.",
    "scene": {
      "location": "Four bedrooms, each reflecting a personal space, united by the early morning gloom. Sparse light leaks in through blinds casting shadows.",
      "time_of_day": "Early morning, the sky just beginning to lighten.",
      "environment": "A quiet city hum fills the background, punctuated by the distant chirps of waking birds."
    }
  },
  "subjects": [
    {
      "name": "Alex",
      "description": "Lying awake, eyes open, reflecting the uncertainty in their gaze.",
      "wardrobe": "Casual sleepwear, adding to the scene's intimate feel.",
      "props": "None",
      "action": "Stares at the ceiling, absorbing the intertwining voices in their mind.",
      "emotion": "Anxious but holding on to a sliver of hope.",
      "dialogue": "",
      "dialogue_intonation": ""
    },
    {
      "name": "Jordan",
      "description": "Resting head on pillow, eyes distant as thoughts spiral.",
      "wardrobe": "Comfortable night attire.",
      "props": "None",
      "action": "Clutches pillow, slightly tense, deep in thought.",
      "emotion": "Pensive, feeling the weight of perceived expectations.",
      "dialogue": "",
      "dialogue_intonation": ""
    },
    {
      "name": "Sam",
      "description": "Wide-eyed, contemplating conversations of past advice.",
      "wardrobe": "Relaxed t-shirt, adding to the realism.",
      "props": "None",
      "action": "Breathes deeply as if trying to calm a racing mind.",
      "emotion": "Mixed emotions of doubt and tentative optimism.",
      "dialogue": "",
      "dialogue_intonation": ""
    },
    {
      "name": "Riley",
      "description": "Gazes softly towards the window, hints of determination underneath.",
      "wardrobe": "Simple nightclothes.",
      "props": "None",
      "action": "Touches the window frame gently, as if reaching for clarity.",
      "emotion": "Determined yet grappling with self-doubt.",
      "dialogue": "",
      "dialogue_intonation": ""
    }
  ],
  "audio": {
    "music": "Sparse, hopeful piano playing softly in the background.",
    "ambient": "Distant hum of the city awakening.",
    "sfx": "Subtle rustle of bedsheets."
  },
  "style_guidelines": "Crisp photorealistic imagery by an expert photographer.",
  "temporal_flow": "The sequence begins with a medium shot on Alex, the voiceover commencing with overlapping advice and doubts. The camera transitions smoothly to Jordan, then Sam, and finally Riley. Each turn captures the nuance of introspection as the sky gradually lightens outside. The scene closes on Riley, who remains looking outward, the piano's hopeful notes accompanying."
}"}]

GeneralDescription: "Wide shot, steady - Cologne Cathedral with sunlight glinting off its spires. Tourists snapping photos, street musicians playing lively tunes."
LocationDescription: |
Wide shot, steady - Cologne Cathedral with sunlight glinting off its spires. Tourists snapping photos, street musicians playing lively tunes.
A bustling present-day scene at Cologne Cathedral, filled with tourists and street musicians. The narrator introduces the cathedral's history and its remarkable moment.
Characters:

CameraAngle: "medium shot"
DIALOGUE: Every day, tourists marvel at the magnificent Cologne Cathedral, its bells marking the hours. Yet, once upon a time, they tolled twice within the same hour — leaving an indelible mark on history. by Narrator

In the style of Ghibli anime
metadata: [{"name":"INIT_IMAGE_URL","value":"https://content.dashtoon.ai/stability-images/b89ba7c7-47fb-48fc-adab-2eb87be56d52.webp"},{"name":"THUMBNAIL_URL","value":"https://content.dashtoon.ai/stability-images/b89ba7c7-47fb-48fc-adab-2eb87be56d52.webp"},{"name":"ENHANCED_PROMPT","value":"{\"shot\":{\"composition\":\"Wide shot capturing the Cologne Cathedral with sunlight glinting off its spires. Tourists and street musicians framed in the foreground.\",\"subjects\":\"Cologne Cathedral, tourists with cameras, street musicians playing instruments.\",\"camera_motion\":\"Steady camera holds on the scene, capturing a lively atmosphere.\",\"scene\":{\"location\":\"A bustling square in front of the Cologne Cathedral, rich in architectural grandeur.\",\"time_of_day\":\"Bright afternoon with the sun illuminating the cathedral's intricate details.\",\"environment\":\"Lively sounds of street music, tourists chatting, and occasional church bells chiming.\"}},\"subjects\":[{\"name\":\"Narrator\",\"description\":\"An unseen storyteller, setting the tone for the scene.\",\"dialogue\":\"Every day, tourists marvel at the magnificent Cologne Cathedral, its bells marking the hours. Yet, once upon a time, they tolled twice within the same hour — leaving an indelible mark on history.\",\"dialogue_intonation\":\"The narration is imbued with a sense of wonder and historical intrigue.\"},{\"name\":\"Street Musicians\",\"description\":\"A group of energetic young performers.\",\"wardrobe\":\"Casual attire suitable for performance, adding to the vibrant street scene.\",\"action\":\"Playing lively tunes on violin and guitar.\",\"emotion\":\"Joyful and spirited as they engage with the crowd through music.\"}],\"audio\":{\"music\":\"Lively street music played by musicians in the scene.\",\"ambient\":\"Sounds of tourists chatting, footsteps, and distant church bells.\"},\"style_guidelines\":\"Ghibli anime style with vibrant colors and whimsical details.\",\"temporal_flow\":\"The scene opens with a steady wide shot of the Cologne Cathedral. Sunlight glints off the spires as the narrator begins, setting a tone of historical wonder. Tourists are seen snapping photos, engaged in the moment. Street musicians play lively music, bringing joy to the crowd. The camera focuses briefly on the musicians, capturing their energetic performance. The narrator's dialogue concludes, leaving an echo of curiosity and appreciation for the cathedral's history.\"}"}]

prompt:
GeneralDescription: "Wide, comic panel. Tommy looks up, startled as the bells toll. The street is littered with rubble, an air of tension grips the scene."
            LocationDescription: |

            A young boy, Tommy, hurries through the war-torn streets with newspapers.

🎃✨ The Most Glamorous Haunted Night of the Year! ✨🎃

Step into a world of mystery and luxury at our Haunted Ball! Think stunning costumes, jaw-dropping designs, exclusive cocktails, music, dancing and delectable appetizers—this is Halloween like you've never seen before. 🖤👻

🕸️ Dress Code: Bring your most breathtaking dark glamour—creative, bold, and fierce. The more dramatic, the better! Costumes and special FX Makeup encouraged.
📅 When: Saturday Nov. 1st 2025 8:00 pm -11:30 pm
📍 Where: Crystal Ballroom, The Hotel Leo, Bellingham WA

This isn’t just a ball; it’s an experience you won’t want to miss. Limited tickets—secure yours and get ready for a night full of elegance, excitement, and eerie fun! 🔮✨

prompt:
GeneralDescription: "विस्तृत, ट्रैकिंग शॉट जिसमें भीड़ और नदी दिखती है। छोटे बीच में खड़ा है, ईमानदार।"
LocationDescription: |
विस्तृत, ट्रैकिंग शॉट जिसमें भीड़ और नदी दिखती है। छोटे बीच में खड़ा है, ईमानदार।
धूप से नहाए नदी किनारे पर प्रतिद्वंद्वी समूहों के बीच तीखा टकराव। छोटे शांति की कोशिश करता है, जबकि बड़ा उसकी सत्ता को चुनौती देता है। भीड़ की वफादारी डगमगाती है, जब तक कि एक वृद्ध की बुद्धिमत्ता माहौल नहीं बदल देती।
Characters:

CameraAngle: "medium shot"
DIALOGUE: आइए, इसको समझदारी से सुलझाएँ! हम पड़ोसी हैं, दुश्मन नहीं! by छोटे दवान

Style: Crisp photorealistic image by an expert photographer

धूप से नहाए नदी किनारे पर प्रतिद्वंद्वी समूहों के बीच तीखा टकराव। छोटे शांति की कोशिश करता है, जबकि बड़ा उसकी सत्ता को चुनौती देता है। भीड़ की वफादारी डगमगाती है, जब तक कि एक वृद्ध की बुद्धिमत्ता माहौल नहीं बदल देती।
Characters:

CameraAngle: "medium shot"
DIALOGUE: तुम दोनों ने नदी की आवाज़ भुला दी है। वह मेल चाहती है, बँटवारा नहीं। by वृद्ध

धूप से नहाए नदी किनारे पर प्रतिद्वंद्वी समूहों के बीच तीखा टकराव। छोटे शांति की कोशिश करता है, जबकि बड़ा उसकी सत्ता को चुनौती देता है। भीड़ की वफादारी डगमगाती है, जब तक कि एक वृद्ध की बुद्धिमत्ता माहौल नहीं बदल देती।

            Action shot - Jane throws the flashlight at the robots, creating a blinding flash. Jake and Jane dive for cover as chaos erupts.
            The chaotic interior of an abandoned building, heavily laden with fine, grey dust suspended visibly in the air, illuminated erratically by the blinding flash. The floor is covered in a dense, uneven layer of pulverized concrete, splintered wooden debris from overturned shelves, and twisted metal fragments. Overturned and broken furniture further obstructs the space. Structural elements like crumbling concrete pillars and grimy, decaying walls are visible, providing limited, shadowed areas for cover. The dominant colors are muted greys, browns, and dark desaturated tones, starkly contrasted by the intense white and blue light of the flash and the red glow of robot eyes.
            Characters:
            Name: "Jane"
Attributes: "Female, Early 30s, Caucasian"
Position: "Centered in the foreground to mid-ground, her body twisted and angled, caught in the midst of a forceful throwing motion, simultaneously beginning to crouch or fall towards the ground. Her right arm is fully extended forward, fingers splayed as if just releasing an object."
Dress: "Olive green tactical vest over a dark, long-sleeved top, black cargo pants, and sturdy black combat boots. Her clothing is dusty and appears functional for the environment."
Expression: "A fierce, determined grimace on her face, eyes narrowed against the light, conveying intense concentration and a tactical decision."
Action: "Captured mid-air, with her right arm fully extended forward in a powerful throwing stance, simultaneously lowering her body rapidly towards a crouching or diving position, creating a dynamic, frozen pose."
Name: "Jake"
Attributes: "Male, Late 30s, Caucasian"

Expression: "A moment of intense focus and anticipation, eyes slightly squinted in reaction to the flash, mouth slightly agape in a silent grunt of effort."
Action: "Frozen in the act of rapidly dropping to take cover behind a piece of debris, one knee bent and already close to the ground, his body angled away from the direction of the robots, right arm extended to brace himself or reach for his weapon, while shielding his face slightly with his left arm."

Attributes: "Non-Human, Adult, Robot"

            CameraAngle: "A dynamic medium shot, positioned slightly low to capture the active motion of Jake and Jane as they react to the blinding flash originating from Jane's throw, with the advancing robots visible in the mid-ground, all within the cluttered and dusty abandoned building. Towering skeletal remains of devastated skyscrapers, stripped of their facades, rise dramatically towards a hazy, bright sky, their exposed rebar and concrete structures casting long, sharp shadows. The ground is a uniform expanse of grey and brown pulverized concrete, twisted metal, and shattered glass, forming debris-laden streets. Piles of rubble are scattered across the scene. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by grays, browns, and faint, dust-covered yellows from the distant light. An unnerving stillness pervades the air, highlighting the vast emptiness and destruction. In the far distance, one building appears relatively intact, a stark contrast to the surrounding devastation. No signs of life or vegetation are present.

  "style_guidelines": "Crisp photorealistic image, capturing natural skin textures and the subtle play of warm light and shadows.",
  "temporal_flow": "The scene opens with a wide shot that captures the entire apartment, with James and Eve in the center. }
```"}]

            As dawn approaches, the spirits fade, leaving behind a sense of warmth and gratitude.
            The full interior of a cozy 24-hour café at night, softly illuminated by warm amber lights from various pendant lamps and wall sconces, casting long, gentle shadows. The room features exposed brick walls painted a muted cream, complementing dark polished wooden floors. An array of plush, deep crimson velvet armchairs, dark leather banquettes, and small, round wooden tables are carefully arranged throughout the space. A prominent dark polished wooden service counter with shining brass espresso machines is visible at the back or side of the frame. Shelves along the walls are filled with antique books, framed photographs, and decorative items. The air shimmers faintly with the ethereal glow of numerous translucent figures. The ambiance is one of serene activity and deep comfort.

            Name: "Ghostly Patron"
Attributes: "Female, Elderly, Ghost"

Expression: "A variety of serene and content expressions, some appearing to be in silent conversation, others contemplating their surroundings."
Action: "Frozen in various static poses of social interaction: 'seated' with hands poised as if holding invisible cups, 'standing' mid-gesture, or 'floating' gently, creating a sense of quiet life within the space."

Dress: "A crisp white short-sleeved collared shirt, tucked into dark grey tailored trousers, with a black apron tied around his waist. He wears polished black non-slip shoes."
Expression: "A calm and content expression, observing the scene with quiet satisfaction."
Action: "Standing still, with hands resting lightly on the counter, poised and observant."
Name: "Tanuki Manager"
Attributes: "Male, Adult, Tanuki"

GeneralDescription: "The café's menu board shifts, words appearing and disappearing, as if written by invisible hands."
LocationDescription: |
The café's menu board shifts, words appearing and disappearing, as if written by invisible hands.
The interior of a cozy 24-hour café at night, dimly lit by warm amber lights, creating soft shadows. The focus is on a large, dark wooden menu board mounted on a muted cream exposed brick wall. The surface of the menu board appears to be a traditional chalkboard, but instead of chalk, words and illustrations are rendered in soft, shimmering ethereal light, some fully formed and glowing, others mid-transition, appearing transparent or fading into obscurity. This creates a mystical visual effect of constant flux, like frozen motion. Subtle ornate carvings might frame the board, hinting at the vintage decor of the café. The interior of a cozy 24-hour café at night, exuding a warm and inviting atmosphere. The space features an eclectic blend of vintage decor and modern comforts, with exposed brick walls painted a muted cream and dark polished wooden floors. Plush, deep crimson velvet armchairs and dark leather banquettes are arranged around small, round wooden tables with intricate wrought-iron bases. Overhead, several brass and frosted glass pendant lamps emit a soft, amber glow, casting long, dramatic shadows that dance subtly across the walls and floor. Shelves along the walls are filled with antique books, framed sepia-toned photographs, and quirky ceramics, adding to the vintage charm. A large, ornate grandfather clock, made of dark cherry wood with a gleaming brass pendulum, stands prominently against one wall, its hands fixed at midnight. The air appears still and tranquil, illuminated solely by the warm artificial light.

WIDE - The vast construction site is a sea of orange and chaos. The driverless forklift careens forward, its path destructive and unstoppable.
A vast and bustling construction site under a bright daytime sky. The ground is a mix of pale gray concrete, dark disturbed earth, and scattered piles of brown wood planks and silvery metal rebar. Numerous partially constructed structures of steel girders, exposed wooden framing, and stacked concrete blocks rise into the frame, bathed in harsh sunlight. Orange portable safety barriers and yellow caution tape are strung across various areas. Flashing, whirling orange emergency lights cast an intense glow across the scene. Puffs of dust hang in the air, creating a hazy, chaotic atmosphere. Several industrial vehicles like cranes and excavators are visible in the background, mostly stationary, adding to the sense of disarray.
